summary: This mod will allow you to fight through six holds instead of three-four holds when your doing the Reunification\Liberation of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This mod will allow you to fight through six holds instead of three-four holds when your doing the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Civil_War]Reunification\Liberation of Skyrim[/url]. Which means you must take over and control the following holds before you can march on Eastmarch/Haafingar.

Falkreath
Hjaalmarch
The Pale
The Reach
The Rift
Winterhold

When you complete the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Civil_War]Battle for Whiterun[/url] quest a message will pop up asking if you want to Extend The Civil War. But If you are on [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:The_Fallen]The Fallen[/url] Quest in the Main Questline just before the [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Season_Unending]Season Unending[/url] Quest a message will ask if you want to extend the Civil War. If you select No then you can negotiate which holds are control by who in the [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Season_Unending]Season Unending[/url] Quest. This also prevents the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Civil_War]Message Of Whiterun[/url] and the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Civil_War]Battle for Whiterun[/url] quest to run at the same time with [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:The_Fallen]The Fallen[/url] and  [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Season_Unending]Season Unending[/url] Quest. If you choose to Extend The Civil war the  [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Season_Unending]Season Unending[/url] Quest will be disabled. And if you want to use my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77142?]Civil War Commanders [/url]mod along with Civil War Extended download the Civil War Commanders And Extended mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76242/?]here[/url] instead since [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77142?]Civil War Commanders [/url]and Civil War Extended conflict with one another. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1005/?]here[/url]

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
